title: IBM and Google earnings: An old bellwether and a new one
contentencoded:
Yahoo, IBM and Google are all releasing their latest business results this week. The earnings reports will certainly express some things about the state of the tech world, but also perhaps, the condition of the larger economy. 

Carl Howe, senior analyst at the Yankee Group, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 16, 2013
teaser: The earnings reports will certainly express some things about the state of the tech world, but also perhaps, the condition of the larger economy.
